title: THRICE Announces North American Tour With MODERN COLOR & DOWNWARD
description: Kicking off on October 17. The post THRICE Announces North American Tour With MODERN COLOR & DOWNWARD appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 6 hours ago
text: Thrice is hitting the road this fall for a nationwide headline tour in support of their extensive career and catalog. Thrice will be joined by special guests Modern Color and Downward for this highly anticipated run. The tour kicks off October 17 in San Diego, CA at the Observatory North Park and will take the band coast to coast, including Halloween night at Boston’s House of Blues and marquee stops in New York City, Toronto, Chicago, Denver, and Los Angeles before wrapping up on November 23 in Anaheim, CA at House of Blues. html:
Thrice is hitting the road this fall for a nationwide headline tour in support of their extensive career and catalog. Thrice will be joined by special guests Modern Color and Downward for this highly anticipated run.

The tour kicks off October 17 in San Diego, CA at the Observatory North Park and will take the band coast to coast, including Halloween night at Boston’s House of Blues and marquee stops in New York City, Toronto, Chicago, Denver, and Los Angeles before wrapping up on November 23 in Anaheim, CA at House of Blues. Get your tickets here.
